name: EEG Seizure Detection Project
desc: Developed a cutting-edge seizure detection algorithm using Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Support Vector Machines (SVM), and Artificial Neural Networks (ANN), applying Python and MATLAB.

name: FAQ Chatbot for Faculty Support Project
desc: Designed and developed an advanced FAQ chatbot system to enhance faculty support, utilizing natural language processing, Google Workspace, and LLMs.

name: Cloud Monitoring App
desc: A cloud monitoring app for AWS that provides real-time insights into CPU and memory utilization across AWS infrastructure.
